name: Obesity & Health
description: Multi-agent coordination across obesity and metabolic health domains. Agents explore data, analysis, and hypothesis layers to discover personalized interventions.

0.label: Nutrition Data
0.description: Dietary intake records, macros, micros, food composition

1.label: Metabolic Markers
1.description: Blood glucose, insulin, lipids, HbA1c, metabolic panels

2.label: Gut Microbiome
2.description: Bacterial composition, diversity indices, species counts

3.label: Physical Activity
3.description: Step counts, exercise logs, NEAT, fitness metrics

4.label: Sleep Patterns
4.description: Duration, quality, circadian rhythms, sleep disorders

5.label: Genetic Predisposition
5.description: FTO gene, polygenic risk scores, hereditary factors

6.label: Hormonal Profiles
6.description: Leptin, ghrelin, cortisol, thyroid, insulin sensitivity

7.label: Medication Records
7.description: Prescriptions affecting weight, GLP-1s, side effects

10.label: Addiction Patterns
10.description: Food reward systems, dopamine, habit formation

11.label: Socioeconomic Factors
11.description: Food deserts, income effects, education levels

12.label: Marketing Influence
12.description: Advertising impact, portion sizing, ultra-processed foods

13.label: Childhood Development
13.description: Early life factors, school meals, activity patterns

14.label: Metabolic Syndrome
14.description: Cluster of conditions, insulin resistance, visceral fat

16.label: Behavioral Triggers
16.description: Environmental cues, habit loops, decision fatigue

17.label: Treatment Outcomes
17.description: Intervention success rates, long-term maintenance, relapse

18.label: Personalized Nutrition
18.description: Individual response to foods, genetic-based diets

20.label: Environmental Redesign
20.description: Restructuring environments to promote healthy choices

22.label: Appetite Regulation
22.description: Novel mechanisms for hunger and satiety control

23.label: Cross-Condition Links
23.description: Connections to depression, ADHD, autoimmune conditions

24.label: Digital Interventions
24.description: AI coaching, apps, gamification, real-time feedback

25.label: Community Models
25.description: Social support systems, group dynamics, collective change

26.label: Emergent Insights
26.description: The center cell. What emerges when all domains converge.

2.name: Mod 27 Zone — HYPOTHESIS
2.description: New ideas. Untested interventions. The frontier.
